attributes.action: Review the end of COVID-19 measures.
attributes.additional_details: We want this to change because many people feel it’ll be unsafe and instead want a staggered return to normality.
attributes.background: We want a review of the ending of all COVID-19 measures on the 19th of July due to the shared feeling that this will be extremely unsafe.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do.  We're not sure whether you want the Government not to go ahead with the ending of restrictions, or for the Government to review the evidence again.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
